desc-txt:
hitobito is flexibly customizable to your organizational structure, so that even very complex structures and permissions can be decipted. As a web application, accessability from anywhere is granted, even with your smartphone.

Thanks to the central data storage, there are no redundancies. We have placed great emphasis on an intuitive and easy operability during the development. So even occasional users will find hitobito easy to master.

open-txt1: The source code of hitobito is published on Github under the GNU Affero General Public License. All software components (Ruby on Rails, MySQL database, ...) are open source and base on open standards and interfaces.
open-txt2: hitobito is an open source community project, initiated by Jungwacht Blauring Schweiz and Puzzle ITC. The project will be expanded in cooperation with other partners - in the spirit of give and take. Read the article "Vereinsverwaltung mit der Community" (in German) of Switzerlands IT magazine 'Netzwoche'.
